this_title: Late Show with Stephen Colbert Season 1
trans_title: 扣扣熊晚间秀 第一季
斯蒂芬·科尔伯特晚间秀
introduction: The Late Show with Stephen Colbert is an upcoming American late-night talk show hosted by Stephen Colbert on CBS, the second iteration of the CBS Late Show. The show will debut in 2015, following the retirement of current Late Show host David Letterman.
